name: Off The Grid (joaogomes87673, SuperSagres, okkgg9)
description:
Survive through a terrifying sci-fi horror experience while taking the role of an explorer that’s sent to an unknown planet to collect information. Hide, fight, gather resources and explore your surroundings if you want to leave this hostile planet alive.

A new and refreshing experience in the survival-horror genre, where every decision you make counts. Sharpen your survivor skills if you want to live another day in this dark, unforgiving planet , where danger lurks in every corner and resources are scarce and scattered.

FEATURES:

  • Traps to slow, catch or kill monsters.
  • Wide variety of ranged and melee weapons to increase your chances of surviving.
  • A four-legged robot companion to help you along your journey.
  • Dark, heavy and dreadful ambience.
  • Inventory system to organize and manage resources.

After playing our game, we would like for you to give your feedback by answering some quick questionnaires. The links are presented below:
